sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT TOP 100
    mandt, id_message, order_request_no, order_no, cust_code, cust_name, contract_no, proj_no, proj_name, 
    cust_po_no, cust_order_date, req_del_date_fr, req_del_date_to, projected_casting_date, actual_del_date, 
    planning_strategy, order_type, cust_class, proj_segment, proj_sub_segment, job_site_location, forecast_order_no, 
    account_mgr, segment_mgr, proj_coordinator, product_type, cab_former_type, vehicle_type, order_pieces AS order_pieces_1, 
    delivered_pieces, credit_status, approval_status, delivery_status, cancellation_status, mat_source_ind, 
    urgent_order_ind, allow_partial_delivery_ind, forecast_order_ind, local_order_ind, mto_ind, self_collect_ind, 
    premium_service_ind, crane_booked_ind, barge_booked_ind, police_escort_ind, company_code, no_of_items, int_remark, 
    ext_remark, time_stamp, remarks, process_status, order_udate, order_utime, transfer_idref, transfer_status, 
    create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, QA_transfer_status, order_group_id, group_member_count, 
    low_bed_vehicle_allowed, fiftyton_vehicle_allowed, unit_tag_mode_ind, must_have_date, physical_proj_no, 
    physical_delivery_proj_no 
FROM 
    dbo.SCM_Order_Header;

text.value: select id_message, order_request_no, item_no, parent_item_no, sap_order_item, material_no, product_hierarchy, order_qty, sales_uom, fg_production_wt_kg, component_production_wt_kg, product_marking, component_prefix, order_pieces, delivered_pieces, actual_del_date, delivery_status,cancellation_status, no_of_points, env_length, env_width, env_height, wbs1, wbs2, wbs3, wbs4, wbs5, mesh_cw_grade, mesh_cw_oh1, mesh_cw_oh2, mesh_cw_qty, mesh_cw_wt_kg, mesh_cw_bvbs, mesh_no_of_bend, mesh_no_of_cut, mesh_manual_trim_ind, mesh_bom_ind, meshb_wire_line_cross, meshb_wire_seq_no, meshb_wire_mat_code, meshb_wire_length, meshb_wire_dia, meshb_wire_wt_kg, meshb_wire_qty, meshb_wire_spacing, bpc_cage_dia, bpc_cage_length, bpc_cage_set_code, bpc_centralizer_qty, bpc_lap_length, bpc_end_length, bpc_pile_dia, bpc_l2_cage_dia, bpc_no_rings_start, bpc_sleeve_id, bpc_jig_id, bpc_add_jig_id, bpc_pile_seq_no, bpc_micropile_ind, pcg_cage_type, pcg_assembly_ind, remarks, time_stamp, st_element, process_status, transfer_idref, transfer_status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, qty_in_base_uom, base_uom, QA_transfer_status, drawing_no, inv_len_in_mm, grade_dia, bpc_layer, cab_main_bar_angle, sap_product_group, product_marking_rev_no, cab_standard_end_no, drawing_no_rev, cab_former_type, bpc_pile_no, order_no, product_type, cab_extended_end_no, cab_stud_end_no, prc_bpc_layer_no, bbs_page_no, mesh_product_code, mesh_lw_inv_len, mesh_cw_inv_len, mesh_inv_mo1, mesh_inv_mo2, mesh_inv_co1, mesh_inv_co2, mesh_slope_indicator, mesh_num_of_links, meshb_MESH_TYPE, meshb_START_POS, meshb_WIRE_SPEC, meshb_NO_PITCH, meshb_REP_FROM, meshb_REP_TO, meshb_num_of_REPETITION, meshb_WIRE_PROD_CODE, meshb_TWIN_IND, meshb_MACH_WIRE_SPEC, mesh_slope, prc_panel_no, prc_panel_seq_no, IDENTICAL_HASHCODE, SIMILAR_MAINBAR_HASHCODE, SIMILAR_EXTLINK_HASHCODE, COMPLEXITY_IND from dbo.SCM_Order_Item where order_request_no = @{pipeline().parameters.order_request_no}

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT TOP (10)
    id_message,
    order_request_no,
    item_no,
    parent_item_no,
    sap_order_item,
    TRIM(material_no) AS material_no,
    TRIM(product_hierarchy) AS product_hierarchy,
    order_qty,
    TRIM(sales_uom) AS sales_uom,
    fg_production_wt_kg,
    component_production_wt_kg,
    TRIM(product_marking) AS product_marking,
    TRIM(component_prefix) AS component_prefix,
    order_pieces,
    delivered_pieces,
    actual_del_date,
    delivery_status,
    cancellation_status,
    no_of_points,
    env_length,
    env_width,
    env_height,
    TRIM(wbs1) AS wbs1,
    TRIM(wbs2) AS wbs2,
    TRIM(wbs3) AS wbs3,
    TRIM(wbs4) AS wbs4,
    TRIM(wbs5) AS wbs5,
    TRIM(proj_stage) AS proj_stage,
    TRIM(bbs_no) AS bbs_no,
    TRIM(bbs_desc) AS bbs_desc,
    needs_galvanizing_ind,
    COALESCE(needs_production_ind,'N') AS needs_production_ind,
    cab_spiral_pitch,
    cab_fleet_pitch,
    cab_bar_grade,
    cab_dia,
    cab_bvbs,
    cab_cut_length,
    cab_coupler_end_no,
    cab_former_size,
    cab_shape_group,
    TRIM(shape_code) as shape_code,
    TRIM(cab_cou_end_type1) as cab_cou_end_type1,
    TRIM(cab_cou_end_type2) as cab_cou_end_type2,
    cab_no_of_bend,
    mesh_lw_cw_reversed_ind,
    mesh_lw_dia,
    mesh_lw_length,
    TRIM(mesh_lw_mat_type) AS mesh_lw_mat_type,
    mesh_lw_spacing,
    mesh_lw_grade,
    mesh_lw_oh1,
    mesh_lw_oh2,
    mesh_lw_qty,
    mesh_lw_wt_kg,
    TRIM(mesh_lw_twin_ind) AS mesh_lw_twin_ind,
    mesh_lw_bvbs,
    mesh_cw_dia,
    mesh_cw_length,
    TRIM(mesh_cw_mat_code) AS mesh_cw_mat_code,
    mesh_cw_twin_ind,
    TRIM(mesh_cw_mat_type) AS mesh_cw_mat_type,
    mesh_cw_spacing,
    mesh_cw_grade,
    mesh_cw_oh1,
    mesh_cw_oh2,
    mesh_cw_qty,
    mesh_cw_wt_kg,
    mesh_cw_bvbs,
    mesh_no_of_bend,
    mesh_no_of_cut,
    mesh_manual_trim_ind,
    mesh_bom_ind,
    meshb_wire_line_cross,
    meshb_wire_seq_no,
    TRIM(meshb_wire_mat_code) AS meshb_wire_mat_code,
    meshb_wire_length,
    meshb_wire_dia,
    meshb_wire_wt_kg,
    meshb_wire_qty,
    meshb_wire_spacing,
    bpc_cage_dia,
    bpc_cage_length,
    TRIM(bpc_cage_set_code) AS bpc_cage_set_code,
    bpc_centralizer_qty,
    bpc_lap_length,
    bpc_end_length,
    bpc_pile_dia,
    bpc_l2_cage_dia,
    bpc_no_rings_start,
    TRIM(bpc_sleeve_id) as bpc_sleeve_id,
    TRIM(bpc_jig_id) as bpc_jig_id,
    TRIM(bpc_add_jig_id) as bpc_add_jig_id,
    bpc_pile_seq_no,
    bpc_micropile_ind,
    TRIM(pcg_cage_type) AS pcg_cage_type,
    pcg_assembly_ind,
    TRIM(remarks) AS remarks,
    time_stamp,
    TRIM(st_element) AS st_element,
    process_status,
    transfer_idref,
    transfer_status,
    create_by,
    create_date,
    update_by,
    update_date,
    qty_in_base_uom,
    base_uom,
    QA_transfer_status,
    drawing_no,
    inv_len_in_mm,
    grade_dia,
    bpc_layer,
    cab_main_bar_angle,
    sap_product_group,
    product_marking_rev_no,
    cab_standard_end_no,
    drawing_no_rev,
    cab_former_type,
    bpc_pile_no,
    order_no,
    product_type,
    cab_extended_end_no,
    cab_stud_end_no,
    COALESCE(prc_bpc_layer_no,'0') as prc_bpc_layer_no,
    bbs_page_no,
    mesh_product_code,
    COALESCE(mesh_lw_inv_len,'0')as mesh_lw_inv_len,
    COALESCE(mesh_cw_inv_len,'0')as mesh_cw_inv_len,
    COALESCE(mesh_inv_mo1,'0')as mesh_inv_mo1,
    COALESCE(mesh_inv_mo2,'0')as mesh_inv_mo2,
    COALESCE(mesh_inv_co1,'0')as mesh_inv_co1,
    COALESCE(mesh_inv_co2,'0')as mesh_inv_co2,
    mesh_slope_indicator,
    COALESCE(mesh_num_of_links,'0')as mesh_num_of_links,
    meshb_MESH_TYPE,
    COALESCE(meshb_START_POS,'0')as meshb_START_POS,
    meshb_WIRE_SPEC,
    COALESCE(meshb_NO_PITCH,'0')as meshb_NO_PITCH,
    COALESCE(meshb_REP_FROM,'0')as meshb_REP_FROM,
    COALESCE(meshb_REP_TO,'0')as meshb_REP_TO,
    COALESCE(meshb_num_of_REPETITION,'0')as meshb_num_of_REPETITION,
    meshb_WIRE_PROD_CODE,
    meshb_TWIN_IND,
    meshb_MACH_WIRE_SPEC,
    mesh_slope,
    prc_panel_no,
    COALESCE(prc_panel_seq_no,'0')as prc_panel_seq_no,
    IDENTICAL_HASHCODE,
    COALESCE(SIMILAR_MAINBAR_HASHCODE,'0')as SIMILAR_MAINBAR_HASHCODE,
    COALESCE(SIMILAR_EXTLINK_HASHCODE,'0')as SIMILAR_EXTLINK_HASHCODE,
    COALESCE(COMPLEXITY_IND,'0') AS COMPLEXITY_IND
FROM dbo.SCM_Order_Item
WHERE order_request_no IN (SELECT ORDER_REQUEST_NO FROM SCM_Order_Header);

SELECT top(5) 
    order_request_no, 
    parent_item_no, 
    coalesce(MB_prefix,'')as MB_prefix, 
    component_prefix, 
    fabrication_pts, 
    coalesce(MB_item_no,'0')as MB_item_no,
    component_item_no 
FROM 
    dbo.ORDER_ITEM_FABRICATION_PREFIX 
WHERE 
    order_request_no IN (SELECT ORDER_REQUEST_NO FROM SCM_Order_Header);

SELECT TOP (10)
    order_request_no, 
    order_no, 
    cust_code, 
    cust_name, 
    contract_no, 
    proj_no, 
    proj_name, 
    cust_po_no, 
    cust_order_date, 
    req_del_date_fr, 
    req_del_date_to, 
    projected_casting_date, 
    actual_del_date, 
    planning_strategy, 
    order_type, 
    cust_class, 
    proj_segment, 
    proj_sub_segment, 
    job_site_location, 
    forecast_order_no, 
    account_mgr, 
    segment_mgr, 
    proj_coordinator, 
    product_type, 
    cab_former_type, 
    vehicle_type, 
    order_pieces, 
    delivered_pieces, 
    credit_status, 
    approval_status, 
    delivery_status, 
    mat_source_ind, 
    urgent_order_ind, 
    allow_partial_delivery_ind, 
    forecast_order_ind, 
    local_order_ind, 
    mto_ind, 
    self_collect_ind, 
    premium_service_ind, 
    crane_booked_ind, 
    barge_booked_ind, 
    police_escort_ind, 
    company_code, 
    no_of_items, 
    int_remark, 
    ext_remark, 
    time_stamp, 
    remarks, 
    process_status, 
    order_udate, 
    order_utime, 
    CONCAT(
        SUBSTRING(order_udate, 1, 4), '-', 
        SUBSTRING(order_udate, 5, 2), '-', 
        SUBSTRING(order_udate, 7, 2), ' ', 
        SUBSTRING(order_utime, 1, 2), ':', 
        SUBSTRING(order_utime, 3, 2), ':', 
        SUBSTRING(order_utime, 5, 2), ''
    ) AS time_stamp_so_creation, 
    transfer_idref, 
    transfer_status, 
    create_by, 
    create_date, 
    update_by, 
    update_date, 
    QA_transfer_status, 
    order_group_id, 
    group_member_count, 
    LOW_BED_VEHICLE_ALLOWED, 
    FIFTYTON_VEHICLE_ALLOWED, 
    UNIT_TAG_MODE_IND, 
    MUST_HAVE_DATE, 
    PHYSICAL_PROJ_NO, 
    PHYSICAL_DELIVERY_PROJ_NO 
FROM SCM_ORDER_HEADER 
WHERE transfer_status = 'T';

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
    Order_Item.*, 
    WMBnotifySORbjpa512.*
FROM 
    (SELECT 
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ORD_REQ_NO, ITEM_NO) AS Row,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(IDENTITY_NO)), ''), ' ') AS IDENTITY_NO,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(INTERFACE_ID)), ''), ' ') AS INTERFACE_ID,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(MANDT)), ''), ' ') AS MANDT,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(ID_MESSAGE)), ''), ' ') AS ID_MESSAGE,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(RIGHT('0' + LTRIM(RTRIM(ORD_REQ_NO)), 10), ''), ' ') AS ORD_REQ_NO,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(RIGHT('0' + LTRIM(RTRIM(ITEM_NO)), 6), ''), ' ') AS ITEM_NO,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(CONTR_NO)), ''), ' ') AS CONTR_NO,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(CONTR_ITEM_NO)), ''), ' ') AS CONTR_ITEM_NO,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(MATL_NO)), ''), ' ') AS MATL_NO,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(NO_ITEM_ROWS)), ''), '0') AS NO_ITEM_ROWS,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(NO_VARIANT_ROWS)), ''), '0') AS NO_VARIANT_ROWS,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(ORD_QTY)), ''), '0') AS ORD_QTY,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(CONV_RATIO)), ''), ' ') AS CONV_RATIO,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(SALES_UOM)), ''), ' ') AS SALES_UOM,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(NO_PIECES)), ''), ' ') AS NO_PIECES,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(THEO_WEIGHT_KG)), ''), '0') AS THEO_WEIGHT_KG,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(PROD_MARKG)), ''), ' ') AS PROD_MARKG,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(RIGHT('0' + LTRIM(RTRIM(HG_ITEM_NO)), 6), ''), ' ') AS HG_ITEM_NO,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(PLANT)), ''), ' ') AS PLANT,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(REQ_DELI_DATE)), ''), ' ') AS REQ_DELI_DATE,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(NDS_DTL_NO)), ''), ' ') AS NDS_DTL_NO,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(VEHI_TYPE)), ''), ' ') AS VEHI_TYPE,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(STATUS)), ''), ' ') AS STATUS,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(ERROR_CD)), ''), ' ') AS ERROR_CD,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(PROC_TS)), ''), ' ') AS PROC_TS,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(REC_TYPE)), ''), ' ') AS REC_TYPE,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(WBSELEMENT_ID)), ''), ' ') AS WBSELEMENT_ID,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(STRUCTUREMARK_ID)), ''), ' ') AS STRUCTUREMARK_ID,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(PRODUCTMARK_ID)), ''), ' ') AS PRODUCTMARK_ID,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(DETAILING_BOM_ID)), ''), ' ') AS DETAILING_BOM_ID,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(PRODUCTION_BOM_ID)), ''), ' ') AS PRODUCTION_BOM_ID,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(SAP_STATUS)), ''), ' ') AS SAP_STATUS,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(BBS_Number)), ''), ' ') AS BBS_Number,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(ITEM_GROUP)), ''), ' ') AS ITEM_GROUP,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(POSTGROUPMARK_ID)), ''), ' ') AS POSTGROUPMARK_ID,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(POSTSTRUCTUREMARK_ID)), ''), ' ') AS POSTSTRUCTUREMARK_ID,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(POSTHEADER_ID)), ''), ' ') AS POSTHEADER_ID,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(BBS_NO)), ''), ' ') AS BBS_NO,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(BBS_DESC)), ''), ' ') AS BBS_DESC,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(IND_ITEM_NO)), ''), ' ') AS IND_ITEM_NO,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(PROD_GRP)), ''), ' ') AS PROD_GRP,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(ST_ELEMENT_TYPE)), ''), ' ') AS ST_ELEMENT_TYPE,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(WBS1)), ''), ' ') AS WBS1,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(WBS2)), ''), ' ') AS WBS2,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(WBS3)), ''), ' ') AS WBS3,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(WBS4)), ''), ' ') AS WBS4,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(WBS5)), ''), ' ') AS WBS5,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(SHAPE_CODE)), ''), ' ') AS SHAPE_CODE,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(INVOICE_LENGTH)), ''), ' ') AS INVOICE_LENGTH,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(EXT_DIMENSION_L)), ''), ' ') AS EXT_DIMENSION_L,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(EXT_DIMENSION_W)), ''), ' ') AS EXT_DIMENSION_W,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(EXT_DIMENSION_H)), ''), ' ') AS EXT_DIMENSION_H,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(Z_SHAPE_SURCHARG)), ''), ' ') AS Z_SHAPE_SURCHARG,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(NO_OF_CUT_PC)), ''), ' ') AS NO_OF_CUT_PC,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(NO_OF_BEND_PC)), ''), ' ') AS NO_OF_BEND_PC,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(NO_ROLLING)), ''), ' ') AS NO_ROLLING,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(COU_TYPE_1)), ''), ' ') AS COU_TYPE_1,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(COU_TYPE_2)), ''), ' ') AS COU_TYPE_2,
        ISNULL(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(Z_PIECES)), ''), ' ') AS Z_PIECES
    FROM 
        dbo.SAP_ORDER_ITEM 
    WHERE 
        status IN ('A', 'T')) AS Order_Item
JOIN 
    WMBnotifySORbjpa512 ON Order_Item.ORD_REQ_NO = WMBnotifySORbjpa512.ORD_REQ_NO

scripts.text:
update dbo.SCM_Order_Header set transfer_status = 'I' where order_request_no in
 (select top (100) order_request_no FROM SCM_ORDER_HEADER WHERE transfer_status<>'T')
